email.title: Bank of America Merrill Lynch Discover Technology
email.text:
Hi everyone,
Our sponsor, Bank of America Merrill Lynch are holding an event **in their offices exclusive to Imperial students**.
Bank of America Merrill Lynch are looking for **first year students** interested in their Spring Week and **penultimate year students** interested in internships to come along to their offices and learn more about the Bank and their tech (drinks and canapés provided!).

event.location: Bank of America Merrill Lynch Offices
event.text:
Technology touches every part of Bank of America Merrill Lynch and underpins each deal we make. Owing to our investment in leading technology the Global Technology division places growth and success as a central part of its strategy. This gives our business the competitive edge to solve business problems delivering high quality and practical solutions. Did you know that the banks mainframe environment is the third largest in the world?
Join us for our exclusive **‘Discover Technology’ event** at our St Paul’s offices for Imperial students only on **Monday 29 October 6pm-8pm**.
During the event you will find out more about Bank of America Merrill Lynch and the important role our Technology division has in the running of our business. We’ll have a number of representatives on hand to give you an insight into our campus programs, what we look for in students, and what it would be like to work for us – in addition to an opening presentation from a senior Director, you’ll also have the chance to network over drinks and canapés with Imperial alumni as well as get a tour of our offices!
This is a fantastic opportunity for students who have either already applied for one of our programs and would like to follow up with a networking opportunity, or to those considering whether to apply – this event should help you in putting in the best application you can.
Spaces are limited, so apply as soon as possible!
Please click [here](https://bankcampuscareers.tal.net/vx/brand-5/candidate/so/pm/1/pl/2/opp/3331-UK-Imperial-College-Discover-Technology-at-Bank-of-America-Merrill-Lynch/en-GB) to register for this event.
